feed.title: Cal.com Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: PostHog event tracking by @nizzyabi in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17653
  • fix: fix wrong dates on OOO edit dialog by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17736
  • fix: Better error handling for user session by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17753
  • chore: routing table nits by @sean-brydon in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17738
  • fix: upgrade prismock to 1.33.4 by @vijayraghav-io in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17735
  • feat: Attribute filter/Segment for Round Robin hosts by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17361
  • chore: Add support for new docker compose command to run V2 API by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17744
  • feat: add text filter on org member list by @eunjae-lee in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17632
  • feat: v2 expose booking metadata by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17708
  • feat: update translations via @replexica by @calcom-bot in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17757
  • fix: Log error correctly in login flow by @hariombalhara in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17755
  • fix: common schedule toggle for team event in never uncheckable by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17759
  • feat: Don't remove hosts when disabling 'Add all team members' by @Amit91848 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17747
  • chore: v4.7.6 by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17766

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.5...v4.7.6

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: install gcal + gvideo by default for google signups by @hbjORbj in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17773
  • ci: Re-drafts PR when changes are requested by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17137
  • fix: no availability on reschedule with load balancing by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17770
  • fix: temporarily revert stricter schema so we can handle invalid DB e… by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17774
  • feat: Record assignment reasons for routing form and reassignment by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17767
  • chore: add rescheduled by property by @Udit-takkar in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17631
  • feat: Record Salesforce ownership assignment by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17775
  • fix: extract clientId header manually apiv2 by @ThyMinimalDev in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17783
  • fix: short text booking questions does not save when we click add by @anikdhabal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17778
  • chore: Release v4.7.7 by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17786

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.6...v4.7.7

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.8
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: added customClassnames for event-recurring tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17551
  • feat: Expose booking created at in v2 API response by @asadath1395 in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17452
  • feat: added customClassnames to event-availability tab by @SomayChauhan in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17268
  • chore: bump lockfile by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17802
  • chore: Add ability to disable Sentry source maps by @keithwillcode in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17699
  • revert: "feat: install gcal + gvideo by default for google signups (#1… by @emrysal in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17803

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.7...v4.7.8

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: v2 booking confirmation emails not sent by @supalarry in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17764
  • ci: Add new release actions by @zomars in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17789
  • feat: Render assignment reason on routing form report by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17791

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.8...v4.7.9

entry.title: New release for Cal.com: v4.7.10
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: improvements for canceling workflow reminders by @CarinaWolli in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17807
  • fix: Conditionally get the first assignment reason by @joeauyeung in https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/pull/17808

Full Changelog: https://github.com/calcom/cal.com/compare/v4.7.9...v4.7.10
